GET /accounts/{account_id}/dns_settings/.description: List DNS Internal Views for an Account

schema.description: Identifier.
Exact value of the DNS view name. This is a convenience alias for `name.exact`.
Exact value of the DNS view name.
Substring of the DNS view name.
Prefix of the DNS view name.
Suffix of the DNS view name.
A zone ID that exists in the zones list for the view.
A zone name that exists in the zones list for the view.
Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any). If set to `all`, acts like a logical AND between filters. If set to `any`, acts like a logical OR instead.
Page number of paginated results.
Number of DNS views per page.
Field to order DNS views by.
Direction to order DNS views in.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful.

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service.

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results.

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters.

modified_time.description: When the view was last modified.

zones.description: The list of zones linked to this view.
